Author: annihilatress
Text: On my fasting days, I have literally counted food smells as meals. “You shouldn’t be hungry because today you had a sandwich and cheez-its and waffles and…” I mean, I probably inhaled a couple calories so it totally counts.

Author: Victor-Graves
Text: When I smell really amazing food, I sometimes have to be careful to not audibly make a sound because sometimes when I’m alone smelling anything that smells like food, i do
